title: Playing for fun
body: Me and a friend just got into LoL and we're looking for people to just play and have fun with. Not sure if this is the right place to post this (sorry if it is not)

replies.body: You won't have fun till you know how to play because almost everyone at low levels are people making second accounts so you will just get smashed every game.
it actually depends on what option they choose when they started their accounts. If you pick the "beginner option" then you are actually matched with beginners.
Why would advanced players want to restart to vs other advanced players without runes/masteries, they would just choose beginner to verse beginners who don't have a chance.
